P 45377348,45391620,45391638,45386307,45362985,45362993,45363108,45363116,45393675,2013260072,2013262823,2013262933,2013262941,55517312A,55517312B,55507867A,55507867B,55495915,55517791,55502231,2012249025,2012240286,2012240271,2012240283,2013269745,41112137,41111956,41315748,41167347,41254087A,41219445A,41035015A,41035023A,41035072,41035080A,2013260094,41054859,41055096,41050717,41219445,41035072A,41035023,41194168,41254012,41254087,45363082,45383957,2013271248,45370517,55507826,55495923,55514087,55511802,55505150,55496061,55500482,55514061,2013270212,55511521,55512487





Update tblProperties set MajorArea = 'Valley' where District = '1' OR District = '2' OR District = '3' OR District = '4' OR District = '5' OR District = '6' OR District = '7' OR District = '8' OR District = '9' OR District = '10' OR District = '11';

Update tblProperties set MajorArea = 'HRM' where District = '12' OR District = '13' OR District = '14' OR District = '15' OR District = '16' OR District = '17';

Update tblproperties set sold = 0 where sold is null;

update tblproperties set province = majorarea;
